title: I'm Helping My Friend Build Her 2025 Wardrobe—I Suggested These Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale Items
text: I can't get over how amazing this season's Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale is. I've highlighted many of my favorite items, including Parisian-inspired selects. One of my friends messaged me about helping her build her 2025 wardrobe. She wanted a few modern pieces to kick off the new year. Naturally, I turned to the selection at the Half-Yearly Sale first.Below are the items I sent to my friend to consider for 2025. I pulled these specific pieces because they're versatile and could be styled with various outfits. Keep scrolling to shop on-trend coats, quality knits, cool tailoring silhouettes, and so much more from the Nordstrom Half-Yearly sale. A beautiful V-neck sweater. Lucky Brand Oversize Double Breasted Coat A camel coat is always chic. Caslon Rib Turtleneck Sweater MOTHER The Dodger Sneak Wide Leg Jeans All in Favor Mixed Stitch Cardigan As I told my friend, this color will be everywhere this season. Nordstrom Bias Cut Satin Skirt Sam Edelman Lyla Knee High Boots Love knee-high boots with a satin skirt. Treasure & Bond Mock Neck Cable Stitch Sweater My friend loved the cable stitch. Splendid X Cella Jane Double Breasted Wool Blend Coat These pants are so popular. Open Edit Oversize V-Neck Sweater Nordstrom Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater A fan-favorite turtleneck. Topshop Cable Stitch Cardigan Treasure & Bond Scoop Neck Long Sleeves Rib Sweater Dress Dress this piece up or down. Levi's 501 '90s Cuffed Relaxed Straight Leg Selvedge Jeans Cuffed jeans are trending. Nordstrom Crewneck Cashmere Sweater Steve Madden Dusty Booties These boots look like they would be three times the price. & Other Stories Alpaca & Wool Blend Cardigan Open Edit Faux Leather Wide Leg Pants Nordstrom Lyocell & Wool Turtleneck Wear this turtleneck on its own or for layering. Open Edit Sophia Pointed Toe Slingback Pumps Nordstrom Merino Wool Cardigan Free People Good Luck Barrel Leg Corduroy Pants All in Favor Cable Stitch Quarter Zip Sweater Halogen® Button Cuff Cotton Blend Sweater Favorite Daughter The Olympic Flare Jeans The darker wash is stylish. Sam Edelman Willette Slingback Pointed Cap Toe Pumps Reformation Renna Tie Neck Lace Top Nordstrom x Harlem's Fashion Row Harbison Long Sleeve Rib Midi Sweater Dress Treasure & Bond Crewneck Raglan Cotton Blend Sweater Kurt Geiger London Bond Croc Embossed Leather Shoulder Bag Topshop Faux Leather Bomber Jacket This faux-leather bomber jacket also comes in black. ELOQUII Stitch Detail Long Sleeve Sweater Dress Yes to that stitch detail. French Connection Vhari Rib Johnny Collar Sweater And one more great sweater to round out the list. Bobby Schuessler is a fashion editor with over a decade of editorial experience covering shopping, style, and beauty. He's spent over seven years at Who What Wear, currently leading the market team to deliver highly covetable and convertible content. He creates data-driven shopping guides featuring top retailers like Nordstrom, Shopbop, and Net-a-Porter and is at the forefront of Who What Wear's shopping tentpole strategies, including Amazon Prime Day. He also works on branded content initiatives and appears on camera in video and shopping livestream franchises. He has also worked across a variety of other media brands and fashion retailers like Refinery29, PureWow, Men's Health, and Gilt covering commerce, trend reporting, women's and men's fashion, home, and lifestyle.
html:
I can't get over how amazing this season's Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale is. I've highlighted many of my favorite items, including Parisian-inspired selects. One of my friends messaged me about helping her build her 2025 wardrobe. She wanted a few modern pieces to kick off the new year. Naturally, I turned to the selection at the Half-Yearly Sale first.

Below are the items I sent to my friend to consider for 2025. I pulled these specific pieces because they're versatile and could be styled with various outfits. Keep scrolling to shop on-trend coats, quality knits, cool tailoring silhouettes, and so much more from the Nordstrom Half-Yearly sale.

A beautiful V-neck sweater.

Lucky Brand

Oversize Double Breasted Coat

A camel coat is always chic.

Caslon

Rib Turtleneck Sweater

MOTHER

The Dodger Sneak Wide Leg Jeans

All in Favor

Mixed Stitch Cardigan

As I told my friend, this color will be everywhere this season.

Nordstrom

Bias Cut Satin Skirt

Sam Edelman

Lyla Knee High Boots

Love knee-high boots with a satin skirt.

Treasure & Bond

Mock Neck Cable Stitch Sweater

My friend loved the cable stitch.

Splendid

X Cella Jane Double Breasted Wool Blend Coat

These pants are so popular.

Open Edit

Oversize V-Neck Sweater

Nordstrom

Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater

A fan-favorite turtleneck.

Topshop

Cable Stitch Cardigan

Treasure & Bond

Scoop Neck Long Sleeves Rib Sweater Dress

Dress this piece up or down.

Levi's

501 '90s Cuffed Relaxed Straight Leg Selvedge Jeans

Cuffed jeans are trending.

Nordstrom

Crewneck Cashmere Sweater

Steve Madden

Dusty Booties

These boots look like they would be three times the price.

& Other Stories

Alpaca & Wool Blend Cardigan

Open Edit

Faux Leather Wide Leg Pants

Nordstrom

Lyocell & Wool Turtleneck

Wear this turtleneck on its own or for layering.

Open Edit

Sophia Pointed Toe Slingback Pumps

Nordstrom

Merino Wool Cardigan

Free People

Good Luck Barrel Leg Corduroy Pants

All in Favor

Cable Stitch Quarter Zip Sweater

Halogen®

Button Cuff Cotton Blend Sweater

Favorite Daughter

The Olympic Flare Jeans

The darker wash is stylish.

Sam Edelman

Willette Slingback Pointed Cap Toe Pumps

Reformation

Renna Tie Neck Lace Top

Nordstrom x Harlem's Fashion Row

Harbison Long Sleeve Rib Midi Sweater Dress

Treasure & Bond

Crewneck Raglan Cotton Blend Sweater

Kurt Geiger London

Bond Croc Embossed Leather Shoulder Bag

Topshop

Faux Leather Bomber Jacket

This faux-leather bomber jacket also comes in black.

ELOQUII

Stitch Detail Long Sleeve Sweater Dress

Yes to that stitch detail.

French Connection

Vhari Rib Johnny Collar Sweater

And one more great sweater to round out the list.

Bobby Schuessler is a fashion editor with over a decade of editorial experience covering shopping, style, and beauty. He's spent over seven years at Who What Wear, currently leading the market team to deliver highly covetable and convertible content. He creates data-driven shopping guides featuring top retailers like Nordstrom, Shopbop, and Net-a-Porter and is at the forefront of Who What Wear's shopping tentpole strategies, including Amazon Prime Day. He also works on branded content initiatives and appears on camera in video and shopping livestream franchises. He has also worked across a variety of other media brands and fashion retailers like Refinery29, PureWow, Men's Health, and Gilt covering commerce, trend reporting, women's and men's fashion, home, and lifestyle.
